abilities.name: Double Shot
abilities.description: Double ShotAbilityBurst After each skill cast, Clint's next Basic Attack within 4s penetrates a line of enemies, dealing them 100(+120%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. This damage can trigger attack effects, and the part affected by Physical Attack can critically strike.

abilities.name: Quick Draw
abilities.description: Quick DrawAbilityAoETypePhysical Skill Clint fires 5 bullets in quick succession in the target direction, each dealing 250(+85%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy hit. The bullets will spread evenly across enemies in a fan-shaped area. Enemies hit by multiple bullets will take less damage after the first bullet. 8.050

abilities.name: Trapping Recoil
abilities.description: Trapping RecoilAbilityBlink CCTypePhysical Skill/Charge Clint shoots a trap net in the target direction, slightly jumping back while dealing 140(+30%Total Physical Attack)(+150%Total Magic Power) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.2s. Successfully hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of this skill by 40%. 10.065

abilities.name: Grenade Bombardment
abilities.description: Grenade BombardmentAbilityAoE SlowTypePhysical Skill Clint launches a grenade in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing them 280(+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing them by 25% for 1.2s. Clint gains a grenade charge every 12s (up to 5). 10.050
